data.name: Battle Waves: Card Tactics Demo
data.detailed_description:
• STRATEGIZE your units in base as enemy waves invade!
  • PLAY ONLINE PVP against others to put your skills to the test!
  • BUILD your hand with dozens of unique units and spells to level up and deploy!



  • CRANK UP the difficulty and take on the "Impossible" difficulty. Do you have what it takes?
  • EXPERIMENT with thousands of combinations in the easy-to-understand - yet difficult to master - Faction metagame.

Wishlist Now to be ready for the call In Battle Waves!
data.about_the_game:
• STRATEGIZE your units in base as enemy waves invade!
  • PLAY ONLINE PVP against others to put your skills to the test!
  • BUILD your hand with dozens of unique units and spells to level up and deploy!



  • CRANK UP the difficulty and take on the "Impossible" difficulty. Do you have what it takes?
  • EXPERIMENT with thousands of combinations in the easy-to-understand - yet difficult to master - Faction metagame.

Wishlist Now to be ready for the call In Battle Waves!
data.short_description: A strategic Auto-Battler with Deck-Building action! Compete in 1v1 Online PvP showdowns or try your hand at escalating PvE difficulties. Unlock over 20 factions and experiment with thousands of synergies, Wishlist Today!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3 Dual-Core
  • Graphics: Intel HD
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 Dual-Core
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1060 or equivalent

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
